long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily browse, search, and use your favorite emojis with the Emoji Keyboard & Favorites extension! This handy extension offers a quick and fun way to find and insert emojis into your messages, social media posts, or anywhere you type online. With 3,790 emojis to choose from, based on the latest Unicode 16 data, you’ll always find the perfect emoji for any situation.

Key Features:
- Organized Categories: Browse through a well-organized selection of emojis in different categories.
- Favorites: Automatically save the last 30 emojis you’ve used, making them easily accessible with a single click.
- Search Emojis: Quickly find the exact emoji you need using the built-in search feature.
- Skin Tone Selector: Choose from a range of skin tones for supported emojis.
- Copy and Paste: Select and copy emojis directly to your clipboard for easy pasting anywhere.
- Up-to-date Emoji Set: The extension includes 3,790 emojis based on the Unicode 16 standard, ensuring you have access to the latest emojis.

Whether you’re a casual emoji user or a frequent texter, this extension enhances your emoji experience, saving you time and effort. Perfect for making your online communication more expressive and fun!
